Summary: A dark circle craft in the middle of two oval/cylinder of white yellow light hovering very low, No sound/not helicopter. It seemed to be flying on bright wings of light,bright enough to be seen as glowing in the morning sunlight.
divs: sighting detailsi know about auto-kinesis(stars\planets are not ufo's) and other common ufo explainations. this was unlike any stereo typical unidentified craft. i couldnt see the dark\obscured circle in the middle. it seemed like it was flying using the glowing cylinders of light that were several times larger than the dark caft in the middle. the largest thing about the craft\object was the two wing-like cylinders of bright yellow\white light(this was at 8:30am the lights were brighter than the suns light). the sun was at about 35-45 degrees in the opposite direction,just starting to be seen over the trees. i was driving south down oak grove road rd. north of howell michigan. i was between marr rd and barron rd. i looked south west over the field between marr&barron. something brighter than the days light & white snow around me drew my attention upward over the field. i will draw a pictures using my key-board now oooo()oooo. imagine the o's are one complete cylinder of bright light. while the ()'s are the dark\obscured middle craft. it was a circle flying on wings of light basically. also the whole craft was connected as one entire craft. i know what you are thinking the picture oooo()oooo looks like a plane with wings and fuselage. with faa lights under its wings. except there was no wings at all or sound( it was very close,less than mile). and the lights where several times larger than a whole 747 passenger jets wings. the lights where yellow\white and solid, two giant long cylinders of solid light. no flahing or anything. also the conditions where clear(not a single cloud) and sunny. i cant think of a single light that would ever be that bright,with the sun as high and clear as it was. the light actually made me look up toward it immediately. with white snow on the ground and sun up,nothing shoulda given off enough light to draw ones eye to it suddenly. i saw the object for maybe 30 or more seconds before my line of view was blocked by tree's for less than 10 seconds. when i reached the next field i shoulda been able to see it over. it was gone completely. maybe the 1st angle i had seen it at was the only one it could be seen in,somehow. because not even the local mediflight helicopter could descended or flown away with such speed. i am so angry with myself for not pulling over immediately and taking pics,i was pressed for time. going to work. i live close to the local airport and know the sights and sounds of all the local air-craft. this object was much too large to even land at our local airport(small jets only). so there is no reason for any large aircraft to be flying that low in this area. it was about at close to the same angle of the sun(35-45*),except instead of south east it was south west. it wasnt higher than 2000-3000 feet,like a helicopter comming in for descent. i didnt witness the craft move at all. i had a passenger who also witnessed the object. i have never seen anybody else ever either take pics or draw a ufo that looked even remotely similar. also the ends of the "light cylinders" looked symetrically curved like and oval or the letter o. like something invisible was holding\containing the light. also i shoulda been able to hear a fixed wing prop\jet plane and helicopter that close. no sounds at all. the object beween the two cylinders of light was dark\shadowed. it was the shape of a perfect circle. maybe the color itself was black or very dark? no other shapes of features could be pulled of it. just the two light cylinder,enclosing the circle craft between them.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Howell
There were no other sightings in Howell on or around February 1st 2010
